meanings.definition: A sacred era in Australian Aboriginal mythology.
meanings.sent1: During dreamtime, the ancestors created the world.
meanings.sent2: The elders shared stories of dreamtime around the campfire.
meanings.sent3: In dreamtime, the kangaroo learned to hop on two legs.
meanings.sent4: The paintings on the cave walls depicted scenes from dreamtime.
meanings.sent5: Children listened in awe to the tales of dreamtime passed down through generations.

meanings.definition: A period of time in which dreams occur.
meanings.sent1: She often had vivid dreams during dreamtime.
meanings.sent2: Dreamtime is when our minds wander freely while we sleep.
meanings.sent3: During dreamtime, he dreamt of flying on a giant marshmallow.
meanings.sent4: The dreamtime felt like a magical realm where anything was possible.
meanings.sent5: Dreamtime is like a secret garden where our subconscious roams.
